author: arossi83
body:
#### PR description:

inside the TrackingDQM some information about luminosity are retrieve via LumiScalers, with this PR the same info will be taken from OnlineMetaData in Run3 Era. The switch take place via Era modifiers.

#### PR validation:

Tested via standard WF:
runTheMatrix.sh -l 11634.0
runTheMatrix.sh -l 138.1

but also manually running the code over a 2018 run (325308) with Era Run3 condition in order to check the access to OnlineMetaData info:
1) cmsDrive step1 -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,DQM -n 100 --eventcontent DQM --datatier DQMIO --conditions 110X_dataRun3_Prompt_v3 --filein /store/express/Run2018E/ExpressPhysics/FEVT/Express-v1/000/325/308/00000/B2080A23-0CFB-6F47-8250-D18B7CC16B45.root --data --no_exec --python_filename=runFirst.py --era Run3
2) cmsDrive step3_DT1_1 -s HARVESTING:dqmHarvesting --filein file:step1_RAW2DIGI_L1Reco_RECO_DQM.root --filetype DQM --scenario pp --data --no_exec --conditions  110X_dataRun3_Prompt_v3 --python_filename=runSecond.py --era Run3
3) cmsRun runFirst.py
4) cmsRun runSecond.py


#### Not a Backport and no backport foreseen
title: Replace LumiScaler with OnlineMetaData for Run3 in TrackingDQM
